data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 10323, Version Hash: ec967a03e10ecc3feb42d017a7037098aa4a7954
data.actual_result: Pressing MOUSE17, 18, 19, 20 does not register ANYTHING in Discord
data.expected_result: Registers either raw MOUSE19 (like it does for MOUSE1-16) or the key set in LGS (e.g. F10)
data.short_description: OSX ONLY: Logitech G600 mouse cannot set MOUSE17+ for push-to-talk (confirmed supported https://i.imgur.com/asvmKL5.png)
data.steps_to_repro: - settings -> voice & video -> push to talk -> shortcut - click edit keybind - push MOUSE19
